org.apache.flink.configuration

类 MetricOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.MetricOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class MetricOptions
extends java.lang.Object

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> LATENCY_HISTORY_SIZE
      The number of measured latencies to maintain at each operator
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> REPORTERS_LIST
      The list of named reporters.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_DELIMITER
      The delimiter used to assemble the metric identifier.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_JM
      The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a JobManager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_JM_JOB
      The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a job on a JobManager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_OPERATOR
      The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to an operator.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_TASK
      The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a task.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_TM
      The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a TaskManager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_TM_JOB
      The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a job on a TaskManager.

    • 字段详细资料

      • REPORTERS_LIST

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> REPORTERS_LIST
        The list of named reporters. Names are defined here and per-reporter configs are given with the reporter config prefix and the reporter name. Example: 
        
 metrics.reporters = foo, bar

 metrics.reporter.foo.class = org.apache.flink.metrics.reporter.JMXReporter
 metrics.reporter.foo.interval = 10

 metrics.reporter.bar.class = org.apache.flink.metrics.graphite.GraphiteReporter
 metrics.reporter.bar.port = 1337

      • SCOPE_DELIMITER

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_DELIMITER
        The delimiter used to assemble the metric identifier.

      • SCOPE_NAMING_JM

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_JM
        The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a JobManager.

      • SCOPE_NAMING_TM

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_TM
        The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a TaskManager.

      • SCOPE_NAMING_JM_JOB

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_JM_JOB
        The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a job on a JobManager.

      • SCOPE_NAMING_TM_JOB

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_TM_JOB
        The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a job on a TaskManager.

      • SCOPE_NAMING_TASK

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_TASK
        The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to a task.

      • SCOPE_NAMING_OPERATOR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> SCOPE_NAMING_OPERATOR
        The scope format string that is applied to all metrics scoped to an operator.

      • LATENCY_HISTORY_SIZE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> LATENCY_HISTORY_SIZE
        The number of measured latencies to maintain at each operator
